short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your subscriptions easily within Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arual Subscription Manager offers a seamless way to track and manage all your subscription costs in one place.

In today's world, managing multiple subscriptions can be overwhelming. Did you know the average person underestimates their subscription costs by over 2.5 times? Many consumers think they spend around $86 per month when the actual average is $219. Furthermore, 74% of people forget about recurring charges, and 42% continue paying for services they no longer use. Only 10% of consumers use tracking tools to manage these expenses. The Arual Subscription Manager Chrome extension is designed to address these issues, offering a comprehensive solution to track, manage, and optimize your subscriptions. (data: crresearch)

No longer waste money on forgotten subscriptions. With Arual Subscription Manager, you'll receive timely reminders and notifications, so you're always aware of what you're paying for. Join the top 10% who use subscription management tools. Arual Subscription Manager offers a seamless way to track and manage all your subscription costs in one place.

Arual provides extensive insights into each subscription's financial impact and overall expenses. It highlights key data points such as overall and monthly costs, budget projections, and due dates. This detailed overview enables users to make informed decisions, focusing on subscriptions that offer the best value. By emphasizing subscriptions that may not be cost-effective, Arual helps users identify opportunities to save money, ensuring they maintain control over their expenses and stay within their budget.

Visualize your subscriptions with pie charts, value charts, and due date charts. These tools provide insights into your spending patterns, helping you identify areas to cut costs and optimize your subscriptions. Easily export your subscription data for use in spreadsheet applications or backup purposes. The import feature allows you to restore your data, ensuring you never lose track of your subscriptions.

Take control of your subscriptions today. Get Arual Subscription Manager and start saving money by keeping track of all your recurring expenses in one place.

During beta testing the extension is provided for $1 per month, please if you use the extension, I would love to hear your feedback both good and bad, either in the comments or directly to me at: davidedwards.me(at)gmail.com
